DEFAULT_ERROR: Something went terribly wrong. We're not sure what happened, but we'll take a look.
ERROR_LINK_EXPIRED: Sorry, but it seems this link has already been used or is more than 30 days old. Please ask the owner of the site that sent you the invite to send a new one.
ERROR_LINK_INVALID: Oh no! It looks like this link is invalid.
ERROR_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND: Your account was not found. Contact your administrator to get a new invite to resolve this issue.
ERROR_EMAIL_MISMATCH:
The currently logged-in user has a different email ([userEmail]) from the invite sent ([inviteEmail]).

You may click here to log out and create an account specifically for moderating.
